ygData.subject: Re: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s a grouping thing, your necro wouldn t understand. :) Looks like they don t like pets having any of the cleric or druid hp buffs. Not sure what
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, Sep 25/99, Eric E Cathell <embroidery@...> wrote:
> From: "Eric E Cathell" <embroidery@...>
>
> Playing a necro as well im wondering what the pet buff thing is about...
>
>
> > > - Pets with greater than 20 hit points cannot receive hit point buffs.

It's a grouping thing, your necro wouldn't understand. :)

Looks like they don't like pets having any of the cleric or druid hp
buffs. Not sure what "balance" issue they have in mind with this. I
guess you could level a lower level magician or necro pretty quick if
you had a high level cleric cast resolution on it. Guess we'll have to
see who complains after it goes live to figure out why they did it.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
